org.microbean.helm.chart

Interface ChartLoader<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of source from which ChartOuterClass.Charts may be loaded
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryChartLoader, StreamOrientedChartLoader, TapeArchiveChartLoader, URLChartLoader, ZipInputStreamChartLoader

    public interface ChartLoader<T>
extends AutoCloseable
    An interface indicating that implementations are capable of reading in the raw materials for a Helm chart from some kind of source and creating new ChartOuterClass.Chart instances from such raw materials.

    Implementations should pay close attention to any potential resource leaks and control them in their implementation of the AutoCloseable.close() method.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    load(Object), ChartOuterClass.Chart

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChartOuterClass.Chart load(T source)
      Creates a new ChartOuterClass.Chart from the supplied source and returns it.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • load

        ChartOuterClass.Chart load(T source)
                    throws IOException
        Creates a new ChartOuterClass.Chart from the supplied source and returns it.

        Implementations of this method must not return null.

        Parameters:
        source - the source from which a new ChartOuterClass.Chart should be created; must not be null
        Returns:
        a new ChartOuterClass.Chart; never null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if source is null
        IOException - if reading the supplied source could not complete normally
